pkgmetadata.longdescription: # OpenWebPOSOpenWebPOS is a web-based point of sale system written in python using the Flask framework.## InstallationRun the following to install:```bash$ pip install openwebpos```## Usage```pythonfrom openwebpos import create_appapplication = create_app()if __name__ == "__main__": application.run()```# DevelopingTo install openwebpos, along with the tools you need to develop and run tests, run the following in your virtualenv:```bash$ pip install -e .[dev]```
